## About Me
My name is **Krish Badri** and I am a junior at Olentangy Liberty High School in Powell, Ohio. Some of my interests include playing tennis, learning math, and reading books.

## About the Project

The data for this project came from Opportunity Insights. It is about the Economic Connectedness of counties around the United States.

The graphs, using factors such as population and economy, show the economic connectedness of counties in the United States
